Title: Directs the department of health to study on the long-term safety of tattoo ink and issue a report making recommendations for tattoo ink labeling
Summary: Directs the department of health to study the long-term safety of tattoo ink and issue a report making recommendations for tattoo ink labeling.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of health to study the long-term safety of tattoo ink and issue a report making recommendations for tattoo ink labeling; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
